ch0101_90_mei/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You look ready
to go today, as always!
ch0101_90_mei/0101_0701_02_10: Why don’t you come join me on a sparkling stage?
ch0101_90_mei/7101_0701_01_10:
The melodies that Meloetta sings have an
incredible power!
ch0101_90_mei/7101_0701_02_10:
Just listening to them makes me really good at
singing, too!
ch0101_90_mei/7101_0701_03_10: Or I wish it did... Guess nothing’s that easy...
ch0101_90_mei/7102_0701_01_10:
I’m doing my best to become a singing, dancing
Neo Champion!
ch0101_90_mei/7102_0701_02_10:
And I’ll whip up the crowd with my stunning
Pokémon battles, too!
ch0101_90_mei/7103_0701_01_10:
In the same way that lots of Pokémon Trainers
admire Champions...
ch0101_90_mei/7103_0701_02_10:
Lots of people admire celebrities and the dazzling
world they live in!
ch0101_90_mei/7103_0701_03_10: I’m aiming to become both, personally!
ch0101_90_mei/7104_0701_01_10:
There are lots of really complicated mechanisms
at Unova’s Pokémon League.
ch0101_90_mei/7104_0701_02_10:
There’s a staircase that suddenly rises up, like
WHOOOSH!
ch0101_90_mei/7104_0701_03_10:
And then a platform that just—BAM!—drops
right down in front of you!
ch0101_90_mei/7104_0701_04_10:
Most challengers are stunned by the intensity of it
all and just stand there...
ch0101_90_mei/7105_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Would you mind
listening to me sing?
ch0101_90_mei/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna put my heart into it, so please listen
with an open mind!
ch0101_90_mei/7105_0701_03_10: I’m actually still practicing my singing...
ch0101_90_mei/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh! There you are! I’ve got something to
give you!
ch0101_90_mei/1701_0701_02_10: Meloetta found it. Here you go!
ch0101_90_mei/1701_0702_01_10: No need to be shy—go right ahead and use it!
ch0101_90_mei/2501_0701_01_10:
An important duty of any Champion is to greet
every new challenger.
ch0101_90_mei/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ll do my best to make sure they can REALLY go
all out and enjoy our battle!
ch0101_90_mei/2501_0702_01_10:
I bet my challengers would be able to relax if I
performed a song with Meloetta.
ch0101_90_mei/2501_0702_02_10:
And I could get some nice flowers for decoration,
and prepare some tea and sweets...
ch0101_90_mei/2501_0702_03_10: Wait...I think I’m getting a little distracted!
ch0101_90_mei/2511_0701_01_10:
Have you ever seen an onstage musical, where
all the performers sing AND act?
ch0101_90_mei/2511_0701_02_10:
In Nimbasa City, they’re putting on musicals
performed by Pokémon!
ch0101_90_mei/2511_0701_03_10:
Maybe I should enter with Meloetta when I go
back to Unova...
ch0101_90_mei/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s a dream of mine to dazzle on a big stage
alongside a Pokémon!
ch0101_90_mei/2511_0702_02_10:
Even if it’s just for one moment...I want to make a
memory that will live on in people’s hearts
forever!
ch0101_90_mei/3001_0701_01_10:
The fresh morning air sure feels great, doesn’t it?
Makes me wanna burst into song!
ch0101_90_mei/3003_0701_01_10:
Ahh, the sun feels so nice! Let’s have a nice, big
stretch together!
ch0101_90_mei/3005_0701_01_10:
The night’s quiet noises sometimes sound
like singing...
